analysis.description:
RefundVault.setMyICOContract (/unique_contracts/0x2cc6ca9c3023a6a876fd54a03f68281c7aad0e8b.sol#403-408) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(address(this).balance == 0)

Reentrancy in ICO.finalize (/unique_contracts/0x2cc6ca9c3023a6a876fd54a03f68281c7aad0e8b.sol#629-664):
	External calls:
	- ! SCRefundVault.close() (/unique_contracts/0x2cc6ca9c3023a6a876fd54a03f68281c7aad0e8b.sol#635-640)
	- ! SCRefundVault.enableRefunds() (/unique_contracts/0x2cc6ca9c3023a6a876fd54a03f68281c7aad0e8b.sol#640-648)
	- balanceAmount = SCTokens.balanceOf(this) (/unique_contracts/0x2cc6ca9c3023a6a876fd54a03f68281c7aad0e8b.sol#652-656)
	- ! SCTokens.transfer(address(SCEscrow),balanceAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x2cc6ca9c3023a6a876fd54a03f68281c7aad0e8b.sol#656-661)
	- ! SCEscrow.deposit(balanceAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x2cc6ca9c3023a6a876fd54a03f68281c7aad0e8b.sol#661-663)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_contracts/0x2cc6ca9c3023a6a876fd54a03f68281c7aad0e8b.sol#663)

Reentrancy in Escrow.fundICO (/unique_contracts/0x2cc6ca9c3023a6a876fd54a03f68281c7aad0e8b.sol#214-239):
	External calls:
	- success = SCTokens.transfer(addressSCICO,_amount) (/unique_contracts/0x2cc6ca9c3023a6a876fd54a03f68281c7aad0e8b.sol#232)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- deposited (/unique_contracts/0x2cc6ca9c3023a6a876fd54a03f68281c7aad0e8b.sol#232-234)
	- nextStage (/unique_contracts/0x2cc6ca9c3023a6a876fd54a03f68281c7aad0e8b.sol#234)
